pr_title: Removed azure cosmos examples module. Removed azure cosmos examples CI

timeline.message: Removed azure cosmos examples module. Removed azure cosmos CI
Split Bounded Staleness and Consistent Prefix tests
Updated tests.yml with test names and updated times

timeline.bodyText: This number is going in the wrong direction. Do we have plans to try and increase the performance of these test runs to get the overall time down?
timeline.author: weshaggard
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,51 +17,28 @@ jobs:
       AdditionalModules:
         - name: azure-cosmos-benchmark
           groupId: com.azure
-        - name: azure-cosmos-examples
-          groupId: com.azure
-      TimeoutInMinutes: 90
+      TimeoutInMinutes: 120

replies.bodyText:
Yes, we are working on that. I have started the work with @danieljurek on Dynamic Resource Provisioning.
No need to block this PR for that, as that change will come after this gets merged in.
replies.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText:
@weshaggard - The reason I increased some of the timeouts is because I merged some of the CIs to reduce the number of CIs.
Earlier these were running in 1 hour, 25 mins, so added another 30 mins to the timeout value as a buffer.
replies.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.message: Added TCP protocol to the CI
